ratings.comment: The readings feel endless in this class, but if you go to lecture the one exam and reflections are relatively easy. You are required to buy her book, but look for them online because you really only need them for papers. Attendance is required for discussion and lecture so don't miss and enjoy the wacky content.
Dr. Whelan is truly my favorite professor at UW Madison. I genuinely looked forward to going to her lectures twice a week and wish she taught more classes that I could take!

I ended up with an AB in this class. Super awesome class - I just didn't go to lecture so attendance kind of screwed me and I did none of the readings which you get quizzed on each week which actually kind of affect your grade. SUPER easy tests, and i studied the night before for all of them.

Prof. Whelan is one of the best professors that I have had at UW .She is such an inspirational person and her lectures are interesting. She really cares about her students and wants them to succeed! I will be taking more of her classes in the future.

Although I had some grievances with the class itself, Professor Whelan was amazing She was very inspirational, cared about the students, and unlike every other one of my classes, I could make it through a whole lecture while staying interested. The subject matter is certainly interesting albeit debatable, and Professor Whelan did an incredible job

Professor Whelan is literally the best ever, she's so knowledgable and well known in her field. This class is not that hard and super interesting and relevant. The class is kind of hard to get into but definitely worth it 10/10

Professor Whelan is very inspirational through her lectures. She cares about the subject she teaches, and it shows through her speeches. I loved this class and would recommend it to any incoming freshman. It tackles important and meaningful topics in life.

She's absolutely amazing- might be my favorite professor/teacher of all time. I walk out of that class truly inspired and motivated by her and the content of EcoYou. She is so incredibly bright and accomplished, while also being an amazing lecturer. I absolutely love her class called EcoYou- highly recommend!

Christine was a really nice professor and tried to make the class really fun! The topics were very interesting! The readings are important since there are a few questions on the midterms that are pretty specific to the readings. Overall great course!

Christine is amazing! She made lectures super entertaining and applicable to real life. I always looked forward to this class and was rarely stressed out about it. Discussion is always fun and low key (Will is THE BOMB)! There is minimal reading that you really don't even need to do and the weekly quizzes are usually pretty easy.

Professor Whelan is amazing! Eco you was probably the best classes I have ever taken. She is so nice and tests are very straightforward. Classes were always interesting, inspiring, and provided an environment where you actually wanted to show up and learn.

If you have the opportunity to take Dr. Whelan- do it!! She is the coolest, most caring professor I have ever had. She is very easy going and her tests are pretty straight forward. Her lectures are fun & easy to follow. She doesn't give too much work/readings. Love her!

This class is absolutely amazing. Every time I leave lecture I feel so moved and inspired to change the world. Christine always finds a way to make lecture enjoyable and fun. Super inspirational. She incorporates her own stories and experiences to make lecture more interesting. Easy workload. Interesting material. I'd recommend to everyone & anyone

Awesome instructor. Fun lectures and activities. Very open with her experiences. Exams are 50% of your grade but if you're in class you will do fine. Books are given to you. Good class to learn about real life situations and how to increase your happiness overall. I would definitely take another class taught by her. She's great!
